document_data.name: Word of Binding
document_data.mainbody: '''''Word of binding''''' was a [[divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] that allowed a [[cleric]] to prevent others from passing through a doorway or accessing a barred container.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell closed and "locked" any door, lock, set of shutters, or even a cupboard, and prevented anyone but the caster from opening it.

If the caster wished, they could exempt [[Church of Oghma|Oghman clergy]] from the effects of ''word of binding'' and grant them full access to any object affected by the spell.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell could be revealed upon a surface by the [[Oghma]]n [[relic]], the ''[[Key of Faith]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
